name: Unreal Engine
title: A visual cheat-sheet for many keyboard shortcuts found in Unreal Engine 5

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for many keyboard shortcuts found in Unreal Engine 5

cards.title: Viewport Transformation
cards.body:
| Shortcut    | Action                      |
| ----------- | --------------------------- |
| `W`         | Translate                   |
| `E`         | Rotate                      |
| `R`         | Scale                       |
| `Space Bar` | Toggle Transform Mode       |
| `[`         | Decrease Position Grid Size |
| `]`         | Increase Position Grid Size |
| `Shift` `[` | Decrease Rotation Grid Size |
| `Shift` `]` | Increase Rotation Grid Size |

cards.title: View Modes
cards.body:
| Shortcut  | Action            |
| --------- | ----------------- |
| `Alt` `2` | Wireframe         |
| `Alt` `3` | Unlit             |
| `Alt` `4` | Lit               |
| `Alt` `5` | Detail Lighting   |
| `Alt` `6` | Lighting Only     |
| `Alt` `7` | Light Complexity  |
| `Alt` `8` | Shader Complexity |
| `Alt` `0` | Lightmap Density  |

cards.title: Level Editor General
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action                       |
| ------------------ | ---------------------------- |
| `Esc`              | Deselect All                 |
| `H`                | Hide Selected                |
| `Ctrl` `H`         | Unhide All                   |
| `F`                | Focus on Actor               |
| `F9`               | Screenshot                   |
| `F11`              | Immersive Mode               |
| `G`                | Game View                    |
| `T`                | Toggle Translucent Selection |
| `(right click)`    | Asset Menu                   |
| `Ctrl` `E`         | Edit Selected Asset          |
| `Ctrl` `P`         | Open Asset                   |
| `P`                | Toggle Navmesh               |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `,` | Profile GPU                  |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `H` | Toggle FPS                   |
| `~`                | Command Console              |

cards.title: Camera Navigation
cards.body:
| Shortcut     | Action           |
| ------------ | ---------------- |
| `Alt` `G`    | Perspective View |
| `Alt` `H`    | Front View       |
| `Alt` `J`    | Top View         |
| `Alt` `K`    | Side View        |
| `Ctrl` `0-9` | Set Bookmark     |
| `0-9`        | Jump to Bookmark |

cards.title: Editing Modes
cards.body:
| Shortcut    | Action             |
| ----------- | ------------------ |
| `Shift` `1` | Selection Mode     |
| `Shift` `2` | Landscape Mode     |
| `Shift` `3` | Foliage Mode       |
| `Shift` `4` | Modeling Mode      |
| `Shift` `5` | Brush Editing Mode |
| `Shift` `6` | Animation Mode     |

cards.title: Snapping
cards.body:
| Shortcut      | Action               |
| ------------- | -------------------- |
| `End`         | Snap to Floor        |
| `Alt` `End`   | Snap Pivot to Floor  |
| `Shift` `End` | Snap Bounds to Floor |
| `Ctrl` `End`  | Snap to World Grid   |

cards.title: Play in Editor (PIE)
cards.body:
| Shortcut  | Action            |
| --------- | ----------------- |
| `Alt` `P` | Start PIE Session |
| `Pause`   | Pause             |
| `F8    `  | Eject from Player |
| `Esc`     | Stop PIE Session  |

cards.title: Content Browser
cards.body:
Note: You need to select assets first for these shortcuts to work

| Shortcut          | Action           |
| ----------------- | ---------------- |
| `Alt` `Shift` `A` | Audit Assets     |
| `Alt` `Shift` `R` | Reference Viewer |
| `Alt` `Shift` `M` | Size Map         |

cards.title: Blueprints
cards.body:
| Shortcut            | Action                          |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `B`                 | Add Branch                      |
| `S`                 | Add Sequence                    |
| `D`                 | Add Delay                       |
| `F`                 | Add For Each Loop               |
| `G`                 | Add Gate                        |
| `M`                 | Add Multi Gate                  |
| `O`                 | Add Do Once                     |
| `N`                 | Add Do N                        |
| `C`                 | Add Comment                     |
| `F7`                | Compile Blueprint               |
| `F9`                | Add Breakpoint to selected node |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `F9` | Remove all Breakpoints          |
| `Home`              | Zoom to selected node           |

cards.title: Asset Editor Viewports
cards.body:
Used in the viewport for the Mesh Editor, Material Editor, Blueprint Editor, etc.

| Shortcut | Action                 |
| -------- | ---------------------- |
| `I`      | Toggle Environment     |
| `O`      | Toggle Floor           |
| `P`      | Toggle Post Processing |

cards.title: Static Meshes
cards.body:
| Shortcut   | Action                    |
| ---------- | ------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `N` | Show Nanite Fallback Mesh |
| `Alt` `N`  | Toggle Normals            |
| `Alt` `S`  | Toggle Sockets            |

cards.body: %E2%80%A2%20Click%20on%20the%20%60Edit%60%20Menu%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Open%20%60Editor%20Preferences%60%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Under%20%22General%22%20(the%20first%20section)%2C%20find%20%60Editor%20Shortcuts%60%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Here%20you%20can%20modify%20all%20of%20the%20above%20shortcuts%2C%20as%20well%20as%20many%20more!
